newsitem.title: USA: HOMEOWNERS SAYS CROSSCOUNTRY TALKS CONTINUE.
newsitem.headline: HOMEOWNERS SAYS CROSSCOUNTRY TALKS CONTINUE.

text.p: Homeowners Group Inc said Friday it is continuing merger discussions with Cross Country Group after the merger agreement expired but that it also received inquiries from other potential buyers.
"These are just simple, preliminary inquiries," said chief financial officer Greg Morris in an interview.
He added the merger agreement with Cross Country had been extended a couple of times.
"It's a matter of a lot of paperwork. The parties are still talking," Morris said.
The provider of services to the real estate industry said the agreement and plan of merger with Cross Country expired August 7 at 2359 EDT/0359 GMT.
